articles.author: Luke Reilly
articles.title: The PS5 Is Getting More Expensive in Europe, Australia, and New Zealand, Again - IGN
articles.description: Sony hikes PS5 prices in several territories for the second time in three years.
articles.content: Sony is raising the recommended retail prices of PlayStation 5 consoles across Europe, Australia, and New Zealand. The company cites a challenging economic environment, including high inflation and f… [+1232 chars]
